class_f_01_dragon_01:
Greetings, I am Hassel. I will be teaching this art
class. It is a pleasure to meet you all![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_02: Now, let me be candid for one moment.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_03:
I imagine that many of you will forget all that
you learned in this class once you graduate![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_04:
After all, you don’t need even a basic
understanding of artwork, much less a refined\r
appreciation of beauty, for most exams or jobs.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_05: So, is my class a waste of time for you, then?[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_06: I think not! At least, I certainly hope it isn’t![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_07:
Think for a moment, all of you. What is beauty,
anyway? What makes something beautiful?[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_08:
Oh, I don’t mean to suggest there’s a correct
answer to my query. The important thing is that\r
you all take time to think about it.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_09:
Think about why we might find beauty in a flower
blooming on the side of the road, for example.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_10:
Question why the sky is a different shade of blue
than the ocean or why the leaves change color.\c
Ponder the windmills of Artazon and how they
move. Contemplate the chilling bite of the\r
waters of Cascarrafa.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_11:
I’m sure you will find that every little detail of
your lives will seem more vivid, more impactful,\r
if you just take a moment to stop and think.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_12:
And I am certain that if you stop and truly
appreciate the little beauties of this world...[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_13:
it will help pull you through the days where your
studies have you exhausted or when work has\r
dampened your spirits.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_14:
Ah, do pardon me for waxing philosophical.
You don’t need to understand all of that now.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_15:
To put it simply, it is true that one doesn’t need
art to survive... But it certainly makes surviving\r
much more enjoyable![VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_16:
It is my hope that this class will add even a little
bit of color to your lives.[VAR 0114(0012)]
class_f_01_dragon_17:
That’s all for today—next time, we’ll try a more
hands-on approach to appreciating beauty![VAR 0114(0012)]
